title: Defining an Advanced Schema
summary: Demonstrates how to create an Advanced schema for a Mindmaps knowledge graph

title: Defining a Schema
summary: Demonstrates how to create a schema for a Mindmaps knowledge graph

title: Downloads
summary: This is a list of Mindmaps releases. It's the place to come to download the most recent versions of MindmapsDB.

title: Setup Guide
summary: This document will teach you how to set up a Mindmaps environment, start it up and load an example dataset to make a query using our query language, Graql.

title: Graql Shell
summary: The Graql shell is used to execute Graql queries from the command line, or to let Graql be invoked from other applications.

title: Welcome to the Mindmaps Documentation Portal
Java Graql
summary: How to construct and execute Graql queries programmatically in Java.

title: Scroll layout
summary: This page demonstrates how you the integration of a script called ScrollTo, which is used here to link definitions of a JSON code sample to a list of definitions for that particular term. The scenario here is that the JSON blocks are really long, with extensive nesting and subnesting, which makes it difficult for tables below the JSON to adequately explain the term in a usable way.

title: Quickstart Tutorial
summary: This document will teach you how to use Graql to load an ontology and some data into a Mindmaps Graph.

title: Java Quickstart Tutorial
summary: This document will teach you how to use Java to load both an ontology and some data into a Mindmaps Graph.

title: Core Overview
summary: MindmapsDB Core Tutorial. Runs through a basic example of how to use Mindmaps Core API.
